programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. programme.title: Business Today

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wall Street Week
programme.desc: Join David Westin as he dissects the latest stories and movements from Wall Street, inviting informed guests and financial experts to provide their thoughts and analysis regarding the market. He examines the impact that the current environment is having on businesses and traders, whilst looking ahead to peruse the likely changes across the financial industry. Whether its CEOs, professors or politicians, each offer their forthright opinions on the financial positives and negatives across the USA, evaluating the significance of the present climate and how they believe the country can continue to improve.

programme.title: Bloomberg the Asia Trade
programme.desc: Live from Tokyo and Sydney with Shery Ahn and Haidi Stroud-Watts, getting insight and analysis from newsmakers and industry leaders on the biggest stories shaping markets.

programme.title: Bloomberg
programme.desc: Yvonne Man and David Ingles give global investors unique insight into Chinas economy, with in-depth analysis and conversations with newsmakers.

programme.title: Insight with Haslinda Amin
programme.desc: The definitive guide for global news audiences to get the complete picture on the biggest story of the day, through probing interviews and nuanced conversations.

programme.title: Bloomberg Horizons Middle East and Africa
programme.desc: Linking the market drivers from overnight in the US and across Asia into the regions trading day, with deep dive analysis of the top business, energy and geopolitical stories shaping decisions.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak
programme.desc: Dont miss the latest and most important business news and stories from European markets, Wall Street, because overnight there is morning in Europe and around the world. The programme is hosted by Nejra Cehic, live from London with the help from Manus Cranny and some other hosts.

programme.title: Bloomberg
programme.desc: Everything you need to know as markets open across Europe. We break down the biggest stories of the day and speak to guests with skin in the game. Hosted by Anna Edwards, Guy Johnson and Kriti Gupta.

programme.title: Bloomberg Brief
programme.desc: Delivering the market news, data and analysis you need to set your agenda.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Take a look at the latest news in finance, economics and investment, most important business stories and the state of the markets as each day begins. Join hosts Tom Keene and Francine Lacqua, who broadcast live from New York to London each morning and discuss markets with various leaders in global finance and economics. Find out everything you need to know about stocks, bonds, currencies and commodities in Bloomberg Surveillance.

programme.title: Bloomberg Open Interest
programme.desc: Matt Miller, Katie Greifeld and Sonali Basak deliver the market-moving news you need to know to get a jump start on the US trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Technology
programme.desc: Hosted by Ed Ludlow from San Francisco, California, and Caroline Hyde in New York, this captivating show focuses on global technology, innovation, and the future of business. It features original reporting and interesting interviews with various tech newsmakers- venture capitalists, CEOs, start-up entrepreneurs, and analysts.

programme.title: Bloomberg ETF IQ
programme.desc: Bloomberg ETF IQ is the first and only show solely focusing on the opportunities, risks, and current events in the Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs) industry, which now represent 30% of all U.S. equity trading. Bloombergs Scarlet Fu and Eric Balchunas are joined by leaders in this market, providing critical intelligence to financial advisers and investors of ETFs.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets
programme.desc: Bloomberg TVs flagship markets programme, providing key insights, analysis and context at the market close. Its a highly intelligent look at the markets that misses nothing.

programme.title: Bloomberg Balance of Power
programme.desc: Informational programme covering stories about worldwide politics, business and everything in between. The journalists report on the top news stories from these two fields, and interview experts who share their thoughts on a wide range of relevant topics.

programme.title: Bloomberg Businessweek
programme.desc: Follow presenters Carol Massar and Jason Kelly as they provide viewers with anecdotes and insights behind the articles found in award-winning magazine Bloomberg BusinessWeek. Anchors cover the breaking business news, while the writers and editors of the magazine share their views on various topics.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mom and Dad struggle to keep hyperactive toddler-aged Gumball from trashing the house and exhausting them they decide to buy him a pet. It works but theres a problem: every goldfish they get him is short-lived and inevitably ends up being flushed down the toilet.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mom and Dad struggle to keep hyperactive toddler-aged Gumball from trashing the house and exhausting them they decide to buy him a pet. It works but theres a problem: every goldfish they get him is short-lived and inevitably ends up being flushed down the toilet.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: "When Alan ditches Gumball to do something more fun Gumball is desperate to track him down and make him pay for his betrayal. Gumball has through gritted teeth prepared a special dinner for Alan to apologise for the way he has treated him in the past. When Alan cancels he is overjoyed until a post on Elmore Plus reveals Alan lied about his Mom being sick and is having a day of fun with his family instead. Gumball tracks down the traitor to give him a piece of his mind but when he finds out his Mom really is sick he has to find a way to make it up to him.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Theres never a dull moment in Elmore Junior High! Come and watch the best Gumball school episodes!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Elmore has been plunged into black and white and Gumball and Darwin have to figure out whats going on.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When their parents all go to a charity gala at the school, the kids are locked in a classroom with a VHS tape. However, when the room starts to heat up, they need a leader to get them out of the situation and have to choose between Anais, a qualified but unpopular candidate or Gumball, a charismatic candidate with absolutely no plans.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Clayton realises he can imitate his classmates, and begins stealing the lives of the people of Elmore.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When people that barely know each other start falling in love, Gumball thinks he knows whos behind it. He rushes to Sarahs house and finds her writing in a magic notebook that turns everything in it into reality. When everything in Elmore gets crazier and crazier theres only one thing for it: they have to write their way out.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Anais has been facepalming every time her family does something stupid, which has led to a serious medical condition.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The kids try to help Dad bond with Frankie. / When the uncomfortableness between them reaches new levels Gumball and Hot Dog Guy decide they have to confront their ongoing awkwardness by making things as awkward as possible. / The kids realise that theyve never known their neighbours name, and theyre way past the window where they can ask. / Gumball has something uncomfortable to tell Penny but doesnt know how, until he makes a deal with Principal Brown. / Gumball and Anais go head to head in a leadership election voted for by their classmates. / Clayton realises he can imitate his classmates, and begins stealing the lives of the people of Elmore. / When unexpected couples in the world of Elmore start randomly falling in love, Gumball and Darwin have to figure out whats going on. / Gumball questions Mr Smalls eco-friendly commitment, causing him to abandon society and live in the forest. Director: Mic Graves.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball tries to convince Leslie hes an expert on all things plant-related. However, when Leslie realises Gumball hasnt got a clue what hes talking about, he decides to call his bluff. An escalation of dangerous dares and stunts ensue as they try to out-plant each other.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. programme.title: Craig of the Creek

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput faints of thirst on a desert highway, so already its not a great day for the little orange shape-shifter. Add to that the fact that Specs and Skinny just happen by in a lockup van, and things go south pretty promptly. Specs and Skinny learn a valuable lesson: maybe if youre going to anger a morphing super-blob by throwing them in the back of a van and withholding precious water, you shouldnt do it whilst driving by a 100 foot cliff drop down to the open ocean. Hopefully these Docs are better swimmers than your average academic.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Total DramaRama is canadian animated comedy series, spin-off of Total Drama, all characters are already well-known and loved by the audience. This time Duncan, Gwen, Courtney, Izzy, Noah, Bridgette and the rest find themselves in the past as kids and their adventures take place in kindergarten. The strict Chef Hatchet is there to keep his eye on them. Any harmless idea of the kids turns out to be a total disaster, they are irrepressible in producing new ideas on how to have fun. the kids are discussing every single decision and plan in front of the cameras just like their adult versions, being a part of a reality show.

programme.desc: Cody gets a super cool, new t-shirt. Its SO cool that the kids dont even recognize him, so Cody jumps on the chance to leave his old life behind and become popular.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek

programme.desc: Gumball Darwin and Carrie team up to convince their fellow students that the school is haunted. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball is walking in the same direction as Hot Dog Guy and with each step it becomes increasingly awkward. Gumball is too busy singing about ketchup to notice hes about to bump into Hot Dog Guy. They manage to get through an awkward moment only to discover theyre travelling in the same direction. Their journey becomes increasingly awkward until a delusional mall cop tries to arrest them and in the process allows them to finally go their separate ways…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Elmore residents are going missing and the cause of these disappearances may be closer to home than Gumball and Darwin think. A breaking news report tells the Wattersons that their neighbour is among the several mysterious disappearances happening across Elmore. Their search for clues leads them to find a strange egg which they soon discover belongs to their own Evil Turtle. The family realise that its their responsibility to track down their pet before she and her brood do more damage to the town.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin agree to do all of Tobiass chores in exchange for good points! Gumball and Darwin discover that Tobias is doing way better than them in an online game called Galatrek. Tobias admits he earns "good points" doing chores for his parents which he then exchanges for dollars to buy cool stuff for Galatrek. If Gumball and Darwin do Tobias chores they can earn his "good points" and use them for Galatrek. Gumball and Darwin think theyve hit the jackpot. But these "good points" may not be quite as good as Tobias claims...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Rocky suggests that the Elmore Junior High kids skip school, the bus is boarded by criminals who seem to want to teach them the importance of school attendance. The masked culprits are clearly the childrens parents, faking a heist to teach them a lesson. But when the police get involved for real, it becomes clear the parents arent the ones pulling the strings.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: As night falls in Elmore the Moon takes us on a tour through the various dreams - and nightmares - of the towns slumbering inhabitants. Each characters dream shows us their innermost desires their greatest fears or just how plain weird they are.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin argue with the Internet and make him mad. So mad in fact that he seeks to wipe out humanity and, whilst doing so, malfunctions! The whole of Elmore is plunged into a time before technology. Its actually pretty nice. Will Gumball and Darwin decide to leave the internet unplugged?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin learn that Hector is not so happy being giant-sized. So they decide to help him by creating a potion that will shrink him down to the size of an average person. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin find themselves in serious trouble when they agree to everything the new kid in school says. The truth is they cant understand a word that he says. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.desc: Gumball has to save Mr Robinsons life during Elmores Senior Talent Show!

programme.desc: Principal Brown tries to "fix" Gumballs dysfunctional family.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Darwin taunts Gumball about how predictable he is, Gumball tries to prove that he can still surprise his buddy. He thinks that greeting a kid he barely knows with a hug will do the trick. Hes right, Darwin doesnt see it coming. But what Gumball doesnt see coming is the awkward social repercussions of the hug...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are devastated to learn that Mr Robinson - their favourite person in the world - is selling his house and leaving town. When they realise that making some final happy memories with Mr Robinson is not enough for them, they decide to stop him leaving, by sabotaging the sale.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Mum and the kids depart for their hard days work, leaving a seemingly lazy Dad half-asleep on the sofa. Mum has given him one very simple job: buy mayonnaise. However, Dad manages to turn this mundane task into an epic quest, showing that his daily routine isnt as inactive as his family imagines.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When the Wattersons arrive at the mall for a day of shopping, they struggle to find a space in the parking lot. They search for a space everywhere - using all their intelligence, cunning and trickery - but as the day goes on, the desperate hunt for a space becomes more important than the trip to the mall itself.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin see an advert for the latest, cutting-edge Bobert operating system and excitedly talk Bobert into downloading it. At first it seems like a massive improvement, but the many flaws in the new operating system become increasingly apparent. After the upgraded Bobert malfunctions one too many times, the kids decide to reinstall his old operating system. But will they be able to downgrade from the upgrade and get their old friend back?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and the jewel thief have a lot in common. They are both round and blue. Also they both like accelerating into blind corners. A full-speed collision results in an accidental identity mixup - suddenly the thief finds himself with a real job at the Lab, and poor old Specs is being used as bedding by a hulking prison inmate. When Lamput decides to open up a can of kick-butt, the thief starts to wonder if a life of crime might be safer after all. Specs has no doubt at all where hed prefer to be. Lamput unveils a surprising skill at the kung-fu nerve-pinch. Specs is busted out of the clink, and returns to the life he loves: sprinting alongside his best bud Skinny, constantly failing to catch ol Lamput.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: After Gumball convinces himself that Penny doesnt love him as much as she used to, he decides to put together a romantic quest to remind her of all the good times theyve had together. programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP. Craig has grown his hair out as an Afro, but it causes problems - with no other choice, he gives himself a really bad haircut. When Craig and his friends decide to build a time machine to fix his mistake, everyone at the Creek thinks that he is a really cool kid named Jacob, and with everyone treating him nicely, Craig begins to ignore Kelsey and JP.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP. When the Timekeeper accidentally forgets daylight savings time, the children of the creek all end up getting home late for dinner. Craig and his friends discover that the Timekeeper is missing and decide to take turns replacing her for the next couple of days, but when they realise how difficult and boring it is to keep up with the time, the Stump Kids decide to go look for her.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP. When he gives them the wrong one, he and his friends set out to retrieve it... and Craig discovers something personal about them.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP. Craig gets conjunctivitis and has to stay at home until it heals - while Duane, Bernard and Jessica head out to the museum, Craigs mum Nicole suggests that she and Craig build a pillow fort. programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. When JP unwittingly beats the local champion, he is asked to enter a pencil breaking championships to defend the title, but when its made very difficult for JP to do so, Craig becomes invested in the championships and starts supporting his friend.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. The kids decide to discover it on their last day and must traverse through a series of underground traps and puzzles that test their abilities to find it.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. Craig is assigned to create a poster on what autumn (fall) means to him - thinking that it is boring, he gets support from his mother Nicole, who asks him to talk about what he thinks of when it comes to autumn. Craig then proceeds to recall stories about seasonal desserts, windy hills, moongazing, chapped lips and diving into a pile of leaves.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. It is the Afterschool Snackdown at the Creek, and Craig, Yustice, Angel, Sewer Queen, Faraday and Roger are introducing new snacks to the judges while JP, Kit and Toman figure out which snack gets to be a delicacy for the Trading Tree for a whole month. However, while Craig is happy with his bug-like snacks, he becomes demoralised by everyone elses dishes.

Theyre so tired that they manage to lose Polly in the blink of an eye. They desperately look for her, but find themselves in increasingly weird situations every time they accidently nod off.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Nicole has decided its time to throw out the familys refrigerator. This doesnt go down too well with Richard, as its his favorite possession. When it turns out the refrigerator is also a magical storage facility for childhood emotions and memories, it makes sense that Richard is having a hard time letting go.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mr Robinson accidentally lets slip how little he cares for Gumball and Darwin, they react by giving him the cold shoulder. Surprisingly Mr Robinson misses them and tries to win back their friendship. After a few failed attempts, Gumball and Darwin realise that Mr Robinsons heart is protecting him, so they give it an intense affection overload.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Its Halloween in Elmore. As the kids go trick or treating we see what everyone in town is up to. The ghosts and ghouls are finding it increasingly difficult to scare children, and are only scaring part-time. Can Gumball and Darwin help them get their scare back?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny might be a man of science, but hes more than happy to get his fortune told for a laugh. The palm-reader sees alarming visions of Skinnys near future; mostly visions that relate to Skinny being squashed, smooshed or otherwise smeared. Its kind of Skinnys own fault; maybe if he paid a bit less attention to chasing Lamput and a bit more attention to not getting squashed, smooshed or smeared, he wouldnt need constant rescuing by a frazzled mystic.

Meanwhile, Craig wants to prove that he knows about animals to Wildernessa by creating elaborate traps for the ferret.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP. programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP. When Craigs mother tells him about the bits of his childhood that he does not remember, he feels that he will forget things when he gets older, so he, Kelsey and JP decide to convert their stump into a time capsule and have Bobby guard it for ten years. Craigs mother convinces him that he needs to create new memories in any event, but Bobby will not give the stump back.

programme.desc: The Wattersons try and reconnect Darwin to his fish roots. When Mom sees Darwin gazing longingly at a fish-tank she thinks their mammalian lifestyle isnt fulfilling her adopted son and deep down he longs to connect with his fishy roots. So the family try to re-connect him with his aquatic culture; they try fish-food fish-language even fish clothes. But when none of it works they realize they may have to let him go.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball gives Billy his first taste of video-games but the sheer excitement causes him to pass out. His mother Felicity summons the Parent Teacher Association and threatens to ban video games all across Elmore. Gumball and Darwin are given three chances to prove that video games can be a force for good, but when they fail they decide to prove that books can be just as dangerous.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Anais arrives in the bedroom to find a messy crime-scene and her Daisy doll missing. She realises that Gumball and Darwin are the chief suspects. But as the mystery unravels, it seems the culprits may have turned on each other.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When an unknown figure shows up and insults their Mom the kids are expecting a massive showdown but are surprised when Mom chooses the path of peace. programme.desc: Rob finally gains the power to destroy Gumballs entire world.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Darwin tries to highlight the plight of all the household objects he feels are being oppressed and maltreated by the uncaring residents of Elmore. He then decides to lead those objects in a revolt against the townspeople.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

Theyre so tired that they manage to lose Polly in the blink of an eye. They desperately look for her, but find themselves in increasingly weird situations every time they accidently nod off.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Nicole has decided its time to throw out the familys refrigerator. This doesnt go down too well with Richard, as its his favorite possession. When it turns out the refrigerator is also a magical storage facility for childhood emotions and memories, it makes sense that Richard is having a hard time letting go.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mr Robinson accidentally lets slip how little he cares for Gumball and Darwin, they react by giving him the cold shoulder. Surprisingly Mr Robinson misses them and tries to win back their friendship. After a few failed attempts, Gumball and Darwin realise that Mr Robinsons heart is protecting him, so they give it an intense affection overload.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

Tweety leads the Looney Builders in building a new merry-go-round at the park for the kids, but his crane then breaks down and affects his ability to contribute to the build.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. When the Looney Builders learn that Taz accidentally destroyed his house, they set out to build him a new one thats smash-proof.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declans success and increase the amount of money hes raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. But never one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Kubarapoiss leiab haruldase puukooretuki. Torik ja Tatik võtavad selle aga endale. Kas Kubarapoisil õnnestub see tagasi saada?

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Reisitigu tunneb end tabaralt. Kas Kubarapoiss oskab teda aidata?

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Mets hakkab kollaseks varvuma. Sedakorda tuleb seenemikkudel paasta iidne Elupuu.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: The Mushlers lead Sushi-Mushi to believe that Pickled Swampost is Mushpots favourite dishwhen he cant stand it.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is pulled out of his dreams by the rambunctious Lemmings who are jousting on sheep. The sly bear gets rid of the rodents by enticing their mounts away with food. Irritated, the Lemmings scheme to remove the bear from the castle during his nap and prevent him from ever returning. Furious at being banished, the bear prepares his revenge, armed with a catapult.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: With a ring that lets their astral bodies travel, the Lemmings decide to haunt Grizzy.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a giant jelly cake. Their chase leads them to the castle library, where the Lemmings accidentally activate the opening of a secret passage. The hidden room conceals numerous volumes of magic books. When opened, each book makes the story content or characters appear in real life. The bear and the rodents covet the same work: one with dessert recipes!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy chases the Lemmings throughout the castle to swipe the delicious jelly cake they were about to eat. He locks them inside a closet and makes off with the dessert. In the closet, the rodents discover a card that enables them to teleport the magic piece of furniture. They free themselves and recover the cake out from under the stunned bears nose. Grizzy understands that hes been tricked, but will he let things go at that?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.sub-title: The Bear, the Frog and the Mosquito
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun bouncing off the backs of harmless green frogs while Grizzy chases some mosquitos buzzing around him in vain. / Grizzy comes home to the cabin and discovers the super fired-up Lemmings dancing madly to the sound of the ghetto blaster. / A confrontation between Grizzy and the Lemmings leads to a room in the castle tower. The bear accidentally sets off a mechanism and discovers a large medieval magic trunk.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy comes home to the cabin and discovers the super fired-up Lemmings dancing madly to the sound of the ghetto blaster. The Lemmings are thrown out into the jungle where they meet a parrot that can reproduce any sound identically. The bird becomes their ally to distract Grizzy and recover their musical equipment, but the mission foils and the gadget breaks. A microprocessor falls out and sticks to the bird, who starts picking up musical waves!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Straddling bats, the Lemmings organize an obstacle course in the pitch-dark cabin. When Grizzy comes home, he panics and switches on the lights. The night creatures immediately hang from the ceiling and fall asleep. When Grizzy ejects the Lemmings from the cabin, they crash onto an Incan temple where they discover a spheric object that can control the Earths rotation. The Lemmings plunge the jungle into deep dark night and wake up their mounts.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings get hold of an old pinball machine and install it in the cabin. Their furious party interrupts Grizzys nap and the bear threatens to break the contraption. The rodents lock the bear in the garage, but he finds a way to escape and gets rid of both the game and its players. Propelled into the jungle, the Lemmings fall on a rubber tree. When they discover its bouncing properties, they decide to make a giant pinball in the middle of the trees!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Sometimes Mr. Beans Teddy can be no fun at all. Feeling the need for a new friend, Bean buys a parrot. But getting the parrot past his landlady and her one-eyed cat, Scrapper, proves to be no easy task. Next, is trying to get the blasted bird to speak.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its a beautiful day at the beach. Bean breathes in the salty air, bliss - and not another soul in sight. What could possibly spoil his perfect day? Answer: British weather. Mr. Bean finds himself chasing an illusive ray of sunshine across town, over hills and dales, a football stadium and the English Channel.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is shocked when Teddy receives a birthday card from Beans girlfriend, Irma Gobb. The bears Birthday had completely slipped his mind. And what do you get for the teddy that has everything? A morning in a toy shop, burgers for lunch and a slap up tea party, of course. (But only if you can afford it.)

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Beans landlady is hopping mad on finding molehills on her lovely croquet lawn. Bean looks to get hammered if he does not rid the old lady of the cuddly little half-blind culprit. He fails dismally with his eccentric mole extermination methods and ends up simply taking the pesky rodent for a ride.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Fung finds out that to earn a delicious treat from Sushi-Mushi you just need to look after the Food Snail for him. No problem! Actually, it becomes a huge problem for Fung!

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: With the Wicked Witch becoming more of a threat, Dorothy, Glinda, and the gang go to Tattypoo, the retired Good Witch of the North to see if shell come out of retirement to help them fight against the Wicked Witch of the West and her silver slippers. Just as Tattypoo is about to agree, the Wicked Witch strikes and erases her memory, putting her out of commission. The Wicked Witch has a plan to trick the amnesiac Tattypoo into believing that she was an evil witch just like her before she lost her memory. Its up to Dorothy and friends to retrieve enough mementos from Tattypoos past to help her remember who she really was.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: With the Wicked Witch run amok with power, Dorothy decides that enough is enough and shes got to find a way to stop the silver slippers. She and her friends travel back to the Silver Fortress to see if it can provide any clues to the slippers power. But the Wicked Witch knows what theyre up to and is watching theyre every move. When they find a mysterious door inside the fortress, the Witch traps them and opens it herself. From the other side of the door walks out someone they would never expect, the Wicked Witch of the East!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Dorothy and the gang retreat back to Oz to inform everyone whats happened: the Wicked Witch of the East is back! When the two Wicked Witches show up in Emerald City and come after Dorothy for her ruby red slippers, everyone else is forced to retreat while Dorothy protects the slippers by herself alone in Emerald City. If the Wicked Witch of the East gets her hands on them, shell be back for good! Glinda helps the gang recruit all their friends and the people Dorothy has helped to come to her aid and take on the two Wicked Witches as a united Ozian front. Just for long enough to get those silver slippers off the Wicked Witch of the Wests feet so East gets sent back to the other side!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: In the series premiere, Queen Ozmas Potion of the Month Club package arrives and she cant wait to try it. Unfortunately, Dorothy doesnt read the instructions before spritzing Ozma with a "Perfume of Petrification." When Ozma instantly becomes a statue, the only way to change her back is with a special antidote.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: When Wicked Witch Wilhelmina (JESSICA DiCICCO) steals the Magical Mandolin ("Play it by day, it makes you dance; but play it at night, it puts you in a trance!"), Dorothy and her friends have to get it back…and fast! Or Wilhelmina will use the Mandolin to put Dorothy in a trance and steal her Ruby Slippers! Dorothy has to rely on her friends and the power of her Ruby Slippers to get it back or Wilhelmina will have her, and all of Oz, dancing to a new tune.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: After a regrettable episode involving his landlady sleepwalking into his room, Mr. Bean suddenly finds himself out on his ear with nowhere to live. Near to tears, he yearns for the cosy familiarity of his old home. A scarecrow and a pair of false teeth come to his rescue.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr. Bean. When his model aeroplane is blown out of the sky by a rival childs plane, Mr. Bean sets his sights on revenge - when the next day comes, his newly-constructed fighter plane is almost ready for take-off, but it lacks a vital part and the local model shop is shut! This doesnt matter, though - soon the plane is chocks away with Teddy at the controls and fighting for airspace over London N10.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers theres only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England. When one of Her Majestys corgis runs off with his teddy, Bean gives chase through secret tunnels… and gets lost.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Jerry leads an accident-prone scouting troop, earning badges and creating mayhem for Tom.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Feeling bad for giving Toms precious blanket to Badwill, Jerrys determined to get it back. Unfortunately, retrieving gifted items from Badwill is not easy. / Tom gets a can of Cat Cop a spray that creates a tiny cop. / Jerry leads an accident-prone scouting troop, earning badges and creating mayhem for Tom. / Trouble ensues when Tom is separated from his own shadow. When Toms shadow becomes a total nuisance to both Tom and Jerry, they must team up to shed some light on the problem! / Rick and Ginger are taking care of their "adorable" niece. / Tom is stranded on a deserted island. Its only other living inhabitant is Jerry. Let the survival of the fittest begin! Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Jerry decides to leave his hole in the evening for a treat, Tom has set a trap for him. Unfortunately for Tom, he falls into his own trap and then gets stuck with his head in Jerriess mouse hole. Jerry tries everything to get Tom out of there and almost gives up hope of regaining his privacy.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A British super spy hires Tom and Jerry to help guard the Queens precious objects.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When an accident leaves Jerry wrapped head to toe in bandages and unable to take his scout troop camping, a guilt-ridden Tom decides to lead the kids into the woods himself. Stuck at home, Jerry cant help but imagine everything that could possibly go wrong.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: An animated series following the antics of a cat named Tom - who is always in pursuit of a mouse named Jerry - and the rivalry between the two characters. Jerrys British cousins Oliver and Alistair come for a visit after forgetting their wives birthdays.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are in the mountains, doing mountainy things. They look through their binoculars and see Lamput in the distance, doing his own mountainy things. GET HIM! After a dramatic chase across the mountain range, Lamput escapes into a cave and the Docs pursue, but its no ordinary cave. Its the home of a very grumpy dragon who loves his beauty sleep! The Docs are captured and Lamput has to come to the rescue to save the day. Luckily for him, his new forest buddies and his specular musical skills might just help in coming up with a solution.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Tired of the daily chores at home, Lamput buys a bottle of Super-Strength potion from a roadside salesman! A happy and super-strong Lamput now wraps up his chores with extra ease! When the Docs sneak up to catch him, they get accidentally knocked out by Lamput. Finally, the Docs realize Lamputs secret! They steal the biggest bottle of Super-Strength potion and pour it all over themselves. The Docs super-actions backfire and eventually land them in jail - all this with Lamput blissfully unaware of all that happened!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: When Lamput masquerades as a swimming trophy at the local pool, Skinny finds himself in his red trunks, warming up for the big race. Youd be surprised at how fast a Doc can swim when theres a Lamput up for grabs. Skinny discovers skills not even he was aware of. Shame the trophies keep switching places. No lap-time in the world can outsmart this little orange blob.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi just cant put down her new exciting video game, even when MOE needs her help packing Bams utility belt for a mission. Can she overcome the enticing distraction to save the day when Bams mis-packed belt goes haywire?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship and more. Feeling neglected after being passed over on missions, Bam asks MOE to install experimental upgrades to curry Batmans favour - however, when Bams new powers are stronger than he can control, Batman and his latest mission are suddenly in danger...

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: When Alice goes to Wonderland, she finds Lewis and the Twins cleaning up the Queens stuff. To gain time, she decides to lend them a hand. But in her haste to get the job done fast, she throws everything into a toy box, including the Queens plush toy! Unfortunately, the box in question works a bit like the blue doors that are dotted around Wonderland: the only way to recover the objects is to think of the place where you want them to go while youre putting them in. Of course, Alice didnt know this... And so, here we have the Queens plush toy royally lost! If Alice and the Twins dont find it fast, Lewis is going to wind up the Queens plush toy from here on out!

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Alice and Lewis team up to win the Great Royal Quiz, an obstacle course combined with a questionnaire about Wonderland. But Charlie notices their training routine and infallible winning technique and gets jealous. Acting as the referee, the Queen decides to cheat in order to give her nephew the upper hand. Our two friends are going to have to remain a tight team till the bitter end in order to avoid all the pitfalls along the way!

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Vivie wants to show Nonna her special chalk drawing, but everyones attention is on Mels cast so Vivie fakes an injury to get attention too. When her plan falls through, Barney helps Vivie learn the value in speaking up for what she needs.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Mel is frustrated that her arm isnt as strong as it used to be after she gets her cast off, so Barney whips up an adventure in the enchanted forest that helps her realize that its okay for some things to take time.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When David asks Barney to play, Barney accidentally forgets to listen to his body and plays straight through his daily nap! He feels very sleepy and David helps Barney check in on his body. After a brief snooze Barney is ready to playagain!"

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A little cat and mouse leads Jerry to take refuge in his hole in the wall where he runs into Franky Two-Face the rat, who now calls Jerrys home, HIS home. Tom finds this funny, of course. Franky Two-Face leads Tom to believe the two are working together but Frankys a no-good, dirty rat. He doesnt play fair. Hes a liar, a sneak, a dirty player, just an all-around dirty rat. He goes to the cats in the alley, says Jerry thinks theyre soft, steals things from Spike and sets Tom up as the thief. Franky Two-Face knows every dirty trick in the book, except one; the one Tom and Jerry use to get rid of Franky Two-Face.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After another destructive bout of cat and mouse, Hildie and Beatie decide that Toms bad cat-titude has caused nothing but trouble around the cottage. What Tom needs is an attitude adjustment! With a flick of the wand, Tom becomes a doting cat. Much better! Jerrys loving the change at first, but he soon tires of the touchy-feely feline (even Newt is tiring of Toms affections). Jerry tries every mouse trick in the book to trigger Toms animal instincts, but nothing seems to break the spell. Jerry has to sneak Hildies wand to reverse the spell, but it wont be easy with tag-along-Tom by his side every step of the way!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Tom again ends up on the losing end of a little cat-and-mouse, Butch sends in Meathead to deal with Jerry. Surprisingly, Meathead has no trouble catching the little mouse. Theres nothing Tom or Jerry can do to make it harder. Jerrys superior intelligence is no match for Meatheads dumb luck.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom chases Jerry into the local Natural History Museum. The chase continues until the two combatants realise theyve been locked inside for the night. Its a spooky place after lights-out and made even spookier by the entrance of the museums guard dog, Rocky. Rocky takes his job very seriously and Tom - whos dealt with this sadistic canine before - frantically tries to avoid detection by blending into the various museum displays (Sabre-Tooth Cat, Cave Lion, an Eskimo hunting seal, spear carrier for a Neanderthal hunting party, etc.). But mischievous Jerry repeatedly rats him out. Its all fun and games until Jerry realises Rocky hates mice as much as he hates cats. Theyll ultimately have to work together to outsmart Rocky and survive this night of fright in the museum.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry have made a connection between a variety of different cases involving the mysterious disappearance of household items -- all including a sighting of a supernaturally cute kitten. Tom and Jerry are on the case! Their investigation reveals a litter of hardened kitten con artists who are using the items theyve taken to form a makeshift home. These kitty criminals are just looking for a home, but they dont want to be separated!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are hired by Polly the Dog get back her collar from park mean guy Barkley.They help put Barkley in the pound jail. He escapes but loses his memory after getting zapped by an electric fence. He clulessly hires Tom and Jerry to help him track down the detective duo that got him caught in the first place! Barkley reforms when he meets Polly and falls in love with her.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have caught a little spider. Her sticky, elastic threads are absolutely perfect for bungee jumping. Grizzy, who has no intention of getting caught in the web, decides to crush the insect. The only problem: he discovers that he has arachnophobia, which is seriously going to complicate the task.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over chocolate-spread jar lids, which they use as chips in a competition to win goodies. Indeed, next to the supermarket are two jackpot-style machines with slots the size of the lids. But more importantly, theres a key to be won that makes you eligible for the grand prize... the giant jar of Yummy on display under a glass cover.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy has prepared himself a TV dinner to eat in front of his favorite series. But his moment of pleasure is abruptly interrupted by unexplained static. Grizzy discovers that the true "interference" is the Lemmings, who are using the TV antenna as a diving board for their water games.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a rave party. When Grizzy throws their stereo into the river he sparks a general power outage. Unless he finds an alternative source of energy and before the Lemmings do he can kiss his TV night goodbye!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: When he realises his beloved she-bear adores the smell of flowers, Grizzy decides to offer her the geraniums that decorate the window ledges of the rangers cabin. Can he bring them to her without the Lemmings - who are skating out by the caribou dung pit and rubbish bins - ruining his desired effect?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Decidedly, this is not Grizzys day: after making a fool of himself in front of the she-bear hes in love with, he is ousted from the log cabin by the Lemmings, who are in top form. Grizzy lands in a field of clover where he notices that one of the plants - with four leaves - seems to bring him good luck. Could his fortunes be changing?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs chase Lamput into the darkest jungle, where they have a go at the literal oldest trick in the book: a covered pit trap. Why these guys think this will work is anyones guess. Meanwhile Lamputs facing a whole different challenge: a lost baby elephant is looking for her mama, and seems to have a knack for getting in all kinds of trouble along the way. Lamput and the baby elephant do eventually find the mama pachyderm - with help from the Docs. And their stupid pit trap. Yet again these guys have caught more than they bargained for.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Beans tranquillity is shattered by deafening roadworks outside his bedroom window. Threats, sabotage and subterfuge all fail to quell the cacophony until Bean has the ingenious idea of feeding the workmen into peaceful submission. But the silence ends with a bang!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean likes nothing more than to relax on his sofa with a good meal and his favourite telly programme. Unfortunately, a painful explosion of springs under his bottom puts an end to that. He sets about buying another one… but, alas, sofas are expensive items. TV dinners may well be a thing of the past for Mr Bean.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr. Bean. Mr. Bean finds a treasure map in a dark and cobwebby corner of his attic, but its tricky clues lead him up the chimney, round the bend, down the garden path, up the blinking wall and nearly all the way to Australia!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: After a regrettable episode involving his landlady sleepwalking into his room, Mr. Bean suddenly finds himself out on his ear with nowhere to live. Near to tears, he yearns for the cosy familiarity of his old home. A scarecrow and a pair of false teeth come to his rescue.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: An old photo album causes Bean to reminisce about his lovely summers at scout camp as a boy, and sets him planning a night under the stars with Teddy. Purchasing a tent becomes a tricky problem - but nothing will stop him having a good time, even if he has to get the garden shed over the roof of his house.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr. Bean. When his model aeroplane is blown out of the sky by a rival childs plane, Mr. Bean sets his sights on revenge - when the next day comes, his newly-constructed fighter plane is almost ready for take-off, but it lacks a vital part and the local model shop is shut! This doesnt matter, though - soon the plane is chocks away with Teddy at the controls and fighting for airspace over London N10.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput faints of thirst on a desert highway, so already its not a great day for the little orange shape-shifter. Add to that the fact that Specs and Skinny just happen by in a lockup van, and things go south pretty promptly. Specs and Skinny learn a valuable lesson: maybe if youre going to anger a morphing super-blob by throwing them in the back of a van and withholding precious water, you shouldnt do it whilst driving by a 100 foot cliff drop down to the open ocean. Hopefully these Docs are better swimmers than your average academic.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Vivie wants to show Nonna her special chalk drawing, but everyones attention is on Mels cast so Vivie fakes an injury to get attention too. When her plan falls through, Barney helps Vivie learn the value in speaking up for what she needs.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Mel is frustrated that her arm isnt as strong as it used to be after she gets her cast off, so Barney whips up an adventure in the enchanted forest that helps her realize that its okay for some things to take time.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Feeling insecure about his size after a game of Hide-And-Seek, Buff uses the shrink belt belonging to The Atom and accidentally shrinks himself down to the size of a mouse!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. Batwing and Buff pair up to take on Snowy and Jestah when the dastardly duo execute a mysterious plan involving rare freeze berries, but a choice by Batwing puts herself and Buff at risk.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: The Queen and King appoint Alice and Lewis to play Kroki-kroka (a kind of mini-golf) on their behalf. But when the King is unfortunate enough to compliment the Queen on her "inability to lose," she takes umbrage and decides to become the biggest loser of all time!! Even if it means sabotaging the match!

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Before heading off on a trip to find new seeds, the Book-Wizard entrusts his garden to his new apprentices, Alice and Lewis. But its a pretty stressful experience: besides having to tend to the garden, they also have to answer the Twins when they come to ask for advice, and entertain the Queen when she decides to turn up unannounced, for teatime! And when Charlie gets whisked away by a bird-book, its panic-stations for the two apprentices. In fact, things get so out of hand that they have to call the Book-Wizard to the rescue!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Its back to basics as Specs attempts to catch Lamput with a net. Not being much good at anything at all physical, Specs ends up whacking himself on his own noggin. The blow shakes loose what little ability Specs had to function as an adult. Hes transformed into a wailing infant who requires 24 hour care from his devoted... parents? Skinny and Lamput have to learn on the job. Taking care of a baby is hard. Especially if its a giant annoying one.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A Robot and Tom go head-to-head, but who will win? And what will they do with Jerry?

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Butch and Tom try to win Toodles by going through some challenges to prove whos toughest.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Jerry pretends to be a vampire to scare Tom. Tom balances trying to keep vampire Jerry at bay and helping the witches make a new potion. Now its up to Tom with the help of his friend Newt to defeat the vampire mouse before its too late!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs chase Lamput to a haunted mansion populated by ghosts, monsters and all things spooky. Lamput makes quick friends with a ghost prince who happens to be the lord of the mansion, but the Docs run into much less friendlier characters while trying to catch Lamput.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Pregnant Doc: During a chase, Specs accidentally swallows Lamput. The Docs plan to bring Lamput back to the lab! However, Specs gets misunderstood by bystanders as a pregnant mother in labor and gets dragged to a hospital against his will. While Specs gets used to being a mother-to-be, Skinny tries to get the two of them out of the hospital and back to the lab. Will Lamput stay in Specs tummy this whole time?Reverse: In a new attempt to catch Lamput, The Docs invent a remote that reverses anything back in time. Lamput must try to escape while constantly being pulled back into the Docs grasp!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Doc Specs and Lamput finds themselves stranded on an island. Will they be able to get home? Or maybe they will make a new home on the island. Has Doc Specs traded Doc Skinny for Lamput as his best friend? Crazier things have happened!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean has forgotten hes supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Maggs pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a new bookcase but it is missing one vital element! / Mr Bean takes Teddy on a seaside holiday but a precocious child decides she should be Teddys best and only friend! / Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. / Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his princess. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their "relaxing" holiday!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr Bean. Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. Every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it has disappeared. Someone is taking it, but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: ""Chasing Lamput" turns out to be the ultimate backstage pass; the Docs pursue the orange blob through the dressing room and directly onto the stage of a gigantic stadium rock concert. The crowd goes wild. Which raises questions about their taste in music, to be honest; Skinny plays guitar like hes gotten himself tangled in the strings (which he has), and Specs drumming, well, its certainly got passion. No taste, skill or rhythm, but certainly passion. The stage ends up in tatters by the time the actual band arrives. Those Docs are a hard act to follow.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are bored. A coconut rolls over to Grizzys feet, pulling the bear out of his state of torpor. He imagines a sort of face on the nut and decides to care for it, like a child with its doll. He has so much fun playing with his new toy that the Lemmings want to join in. But when the bear refuses, the Lemmings ruse: they hide inside other coconuts in hopes of being adopted by Grizzy!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While bickering with the Lemmings over control of the TV, Grizzy sees an illustration that gives him an idea. In a medical book, a person whose leg is in a cast is being served dinner in front of a TV. Grizzy pretends to have a twisted ankle and shows the Lemmings the patient care illustrations. The imaginary invalid Grizzy is so convincing that the Lemmings fall for the trick. They think that the sooner Grizzy is healed, the sooner they will be able to throw him out of the cabin as planned.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread in the cabin and it ends up sinking in the lagoon. The bear makes a diving suit from various home facilities, while the Lemmings share a diving tank to put a wrench in their adversarys flippers! But the local wildlife comes to meet them…

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up after a nap, starving, but the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread is empty. The cupboards are barren, except for a package of chocolate powder. Grizzy has the idea of mixing it with coconut milk. Its absolutely delicious! But the Lemmings, who are every bit as gluttonous, want their share of the choco-coco drink!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy gets a nice big bite on the end of his fishing line. While he concentrates hard to strike his catch, the Lemmings divert the fish to tow them on a kite. Grizzy tries to sabotage their improvised kitesurfing game to recover whats rightfully his, until a sharks fin appears on the horizon!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The cupboards of the log cabin are hopelessly empty and Grizzys belly is rumbling. Through his binoculars, he observes the overexcited Lemmings slipping all sorts of small metal objects into the slot of… a Yummy vending machine!?! The bear joins them on the pontoon. If only they could find some coins to make the machine work. Maybe the solution is to find the booty indicated on the treasure map they unearthed on the beach?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: After a head-on collision with the milkman, Mr. Beans landlady is rushed to hospital, leaving him to look after her odious one-eyed cat Scrapper. Fur isnt the only thing that flies and in the end its Bean that needs looking after.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is delighted with his new "ship in a bottle" until it mistakenly ends up on a milkmans float. He frantically pursues his prize possession, only to see it disappear into a milk bottling plant at the local dairy. Getting it back promises to be a mission of the impossible.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: With his teddy bear at the dry cleaners, Mr. Bean finds himself feeling lonely. Fortunately, a new playmate appears in the shape of a goldfish from the garden pond. Bean has a great time with his new best friend until, at the seaside, he discovers that some fish are gigantic, have large pointed teeth and fins on their backs.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Conned by a mechanic into believing his beloved car to be beyond repair, Mr. Bean reluctantly consigns his faithful four-wheeled friend to the car crusher. After choosing hot-air ballooning as an alternative mode of transport, he spots his cherished car from the air… with the unscrupulous mechanic whistling at the wheel! This discovery raises more than Mr. Beans spirits.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Beans Birthday dinner gets off on the wrong foot when he and Teddy are made to take the worst table at a swanky restaurant. The evening is further ruined by a self-obsessed movie star at the next table. After a swim in the lobster tank, Mr. Bean unwittingly cooks up sweet revenge in the kitchen.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: During a visit to Londons National Gallery, Bean witnesses the theft of a major work of art. Bloodhound that he is, he pursues the culprit across the Channel to Paris only to be waylaid by a Reliant Robin, a traffic jam, and a mime artist under the Eiffel Tower. Will Mr Bean "the International Art Sleuth" prove successful?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Whos afraid of daft films about giant killer cats, blobs from outer space and thumb-size men who dance around in sugar bowls? Mr. Bean is. Hes very afraid. A trip to the cinema makes Mr. Beans imagination play tricks on him.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Against his better judgement, Bean has agreed to go out on a proper date with Irma Gobb, his girlfriend. She has the perfect evening planned: a romantic film followed by a candlelit dinner for two. If only she had the perfect boyfriend to go with it.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud

programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: With their endless battles over the rangers cabin which they do not want to share Grizzy and the Lemmings end up blowing the cabin up. / The Lemmings encounter a white bear which has drifted all the way to them on a chunk of ice which is slowly melting. / Grizzy gets rid of the Lemmings by crushing them with one of the rangers heavy trunks which he immediately clears out of the cabin his enemies stuck to it like stickers.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: For a blob of goo, Lamput sure has a big heart; the orange softie really cant sleep until the little spider nearby has help building its web. Good deeds go a long way, too - when a swarm of nasty mosquitos decides to prey upon the sleeping Lamput, the little spider goes above and beyond to protect its new orange bestie. The spider wins in the end, although theres a bit of a close call at one stage. Why did Lamput decide to go to bed right next to a thousand foot drop to certain doom? We may never know.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must lead a new super vehicle team consisting of Nightbike, Goldie, Grundy, and Kitty after the Legion of Zoom traps the rest of the Batwheels in the Batcave.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.sub-title: Save the Bat Dance for Me
programme.desc: Redbird is convinced that nobody likes his eccentric dance moves, but when Toyman traps Robin behind a dance-themed gauntlet, its up to the rambunctious rally car to dance his way to victory.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Theyre the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Theyre the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. When the Looney Builders build themselves a playground, Daffy gets so excited about his section that he takes all the supplies for himself.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. The Looney Builders are hired by Mac and Tosh Gopher to build an underground home for them, but Daffy cant remove rocks from the area fast enough and fails to ask for help.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. Bizzy Buzzards mum hires the Looney Builders to build a new nest for her family, but all sorts of problems are created for the crew when Bizzy wants to help but keeps getting in the way.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. The Looney Builders are hired by Hoots Talon to expand and paint an old library - they enlist master painter Sylvester for the job, but he must face his fear of heights with the help of his build buddy Tweety if it is to be a success.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but for some reason the do-gooders dont want to push him all the way to the beach! Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate. Bean begs Mrs. Wicket to let him stay with her. She agrees as long as Bean helps her with cooking cleaning etc. 24 hours later and Bean is desperate to see the back of her. The feeling is mutual. But then Mrs. Wicket starts itching …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain. Taking refuge in a trendy coffee bar Bean is fascinated both by the brewing machinery and the amount of money people will pay for small cups of coffee! Scenting a fortune to be made Bean opens up his own strange successful coffee bar …

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Chep is the only Mushable who cant bend a small branch back to catapult himself between two trees. He feels weak and embarrassed. But when strength doesnt work, Chep realizes that its all in the technique!

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: It seems like Starmush is the only one who can answer Mush-Mushs difficult questions. But Starmush lives so far away in the Dark Forest! Mush-Mush hatches a plan to get Starmush to move to Mushton, so he can get answers right here at home.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Lilit remembers loving balancing on a slack-vine when she was a Mushlet. But actually, she never really learnt how, so she keeps falling off and getting really frustrated. Its up to Morel to step up and finally teach Lilit how to slack-vine like a pro.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Chep and Mush-Mush sometimes dont listen to Lilit. So when she tries to tell them about her great idea to have a special firefly night, they instead believe it is their idea. Grrr! Whose special firefly night will come out on top?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy, a big chocolate lover, is growing a young cacao tree under an ultraviolet lamp. During a trampoline session, the Lemmings accidentally break the lamp, provoking a supernatural reaction. One of them is transformed into a Super Lemming who makes any plant he touches turn into a giant. Grizzy imagines the huge pods his cocoa tree would produce if it were to become giant too.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: During a fight, Grizzy and the Lemmings stumble upon a Mayan temple lost in the jungle. Once inside, they set off a magic reaction that creates doubles of themselves at different ages. They now have a Grizzy babe and elderly Lemmings. Grizzy tries to get the young bear interested in a documentary on salmon, while the Lemmings want to initiate their ancestors to dance. But age differences are not so easily defeated.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Short on food supplies, Grizzy has gone out to gather fruit. He comes back with a basketful but discovers that the Lemmings have stolen the last helping of Yummy chocolate spread in the cabin. A fight breaks out. The rodents are thrown out and land in a dugout canoe filled with traditional fishing gear. Armed with blowpipes, they come back to confront Grizzy, who is ejected in turn. In the canoe, the bear discovers a magic blowpipe.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Short on food supplies, Grizzy has gone out to gather fruit. He comes back with a basketful but discovers that the Lemmings have stolen the last of the chocolate spread. / The Lemmings take off with the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread. Grizzy catches up with them but they drop the jar and it lands in a nearby sacred temple. Grizzy and the Lemmings must solve riddles along the path to the Yummy. / Grizzy wakes up after a nap, starving, but the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread is empty. The cupboards are barren, except for a package of chocolate powder.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize wrestling combats on the living room couch. Grizzy, weary of the clamor, stops the match. The displeased Lemmings retaliate, but during their fight the cabins wood floor caves in and they all fall into an old sidecar with four wrestling masks inside. Grizzy, two Lemmings and a partridge launch into a pitiless combat.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After a spat over a jar of Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings find gold leaf-wrapped chocolate bits scattered in the jungle. Delicious! On the backs of a bat and a tapir, the rodents and the bear fight over the harvest of candy. They then realize that the chocolate came from the back of a truck which is losing its cargo. Grizzy and the Lemmings join forces to recover the entire load.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the last spoonful of Yummy. Their brawl is interrupted when they happen upon a full crate of chocolate spread in the garage. The rodents snatch the crate and take off on a drone. The bear catches up with them, mounted on the back of a giant bat, but the cargo falls onto the roof of a sacred Mayan temple thats boobytrapped! When they recover the Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings are pursued by a stone giant!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Night has fallen over the jungle and the solar panels do not generate enough electricity to charge Grizzys TV. When he surprises the Lemmings playing with fireflies that could make his panels work, he catapults the rodents into the distance. The rodents land on a Mayan temple where they discover a magic tiara that can control fireflies. Grizzy, lacking electricity, wants to get the tiara for himself.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Beans tranquillity is shattered by deafening roadworks outside his bedroom window. Threats, sabotage and subterfuge all fail to quell the cacophony until Bean has the ingenious idea of feeding the workmen into peaceful submission. But the silence ends with a bang!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean likes nothing more than to relax on his sofa with a good meal and his favourite telly programme. Unfortunately, a painful explosion of springs under his bottom puts an end to that. He sets about buying another one… but, alas, sofas are expensive items. TV dinners may well be a thing of the past for Mr Bean.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr. Bean. Mr. Bean finds a treasure map in a dark and cobwebby corner of his attic, but its tricky clues lead him up the chimney, round the bend, down the garden path, up the blinking wall and nearly all the way to Australia!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: After a regrettable episode involving his landlady sleepwalking into his room, Mr. Bean suddenly finds himself out on his ear with nowhere to live. Near to tears, he yearns for the cosy familiarity of his old home. A scarecrow and a pair of false teeth come to his rescue.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Kas teadsid, et metsas asub imetore Mikumaa, kus elab seenerahvas? Nad on pisikesed metsavalvurid ja igal seenemikul on mingi eriline anne: Mikk-Mikk oskab loodusega suhelda, Lilit sarab eredalt ja Kubarapoisilile jaab kõik hasti meelde. Tule avasta koos nendega loodust ja seelabi ka iseennast! Mikumaal kasvav vana tammepuu, kus seenemikud on alati trallitada armastanud, saab vanaks ja pehkib labi… Mida teha, et vana armas puu paasta? Mikk-Mikk, Lilit ja Kubarapoiss tõttavad vanale sõbrale appi!

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: When Fung and Miff spoil Mush-Mushs fun tunnel surprise he has been working on for ages, he wishes their day was ruined too. And then it is, because they are taken by Muddler! Now our Mushlers have to go on a rescue mission to save Fung and Miff.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Mikk-Mikk, Lilit ja Kubarapoiss paastavad linnumuna mardikate kaest ning toimetavad selle kenasti linnuema juurde tagasi.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Kubarapoiss sõbruneb pisimutukaga, kes kardab lennata. Kas tal õnnestub uus sõber lennuhirmust ule aidata?

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
