From venomous snakes to angry scorpions, unmovable squatters to crumbling structures, Eric and Lindsey soon learn that polishing these diamonds in the rough, as well as raising three children, is going to take all the energy they have.

programme.title: Desert Flippers
programme.desc: Reality series following experienced property renovators Eric and Lindsey Bennett. After leaving their Wisconsin home behind, Eric and Lindsey have their sights set firmly on transforming properties in Palm Springs, California. programme.title: Down Home Fab
programme.desc: A local romance author and her husband love to host in their backyard oasis, but their indoors is cramped and dark. The DeBoers aim to refresh their living spaces.

programme.title: Down Home Fab
programme.desc: A couple has huge dreams of a fabulous home to host their large social network. Chelsea and Cole look to design the perfect party layout!

programme.title: Home In A Heartbeat With Galey Alix
programme.desc: A couple has become overwhelmed with their home which has turned into their kids playground. Galey create a dream space the entire family can enjoy.

programme.title: Home In A Heartbeat With Galey Alix
programme.desc: A couple are ready to renovate their dated bedroom and bathroom suite. Galey feels the pressure to deliver big, and even surprise the kids with a space of their own.

programme.title: Divided By Design
programme.desc: A Brickell high-rise project is hampered by sloppy work. And Ray and Eilyns condo needs repair that diverts money from completing their forever home.

programme.title: Divided By Design
programme.desc: Escalating costs raise challenges as Ray overhauls his besties backyard. And tensions flare as Eilyn hires her sister to repair a leak at her condo.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU
programme.sub-title: Glenn Close Gifts a One of a Kind Home
programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. There to help them on their adventure are twin brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott. Some of the amazing people featured on the programme are Rebel Wilson, Bred Pitt, Jeremy Renner, Michael Buble, Allison Janney, LeAnn Rimes, Kevin Hart, and many others.

programme.title: Vaike maja, suur majapidamine
programme.desc: Documentary series showing the journey of people in America who are joining the tiny-house movement, where people are actively choosing to live in smaller houses. We follow the construction process of houses that are often less than 500 square feet. We see the challenges the builders face when constructing a small home and ingenuous space-saving ideas they come up with to make the most of the limited floorspace. This show meets single people, couples and families who explain how they reached this decision to downsize to a mini-home, or why they have picked a small house as their first home. For some this is a financial decision, trying to avoid the large cost of living that comes with a standard house. Others are doing this for ecological reasons. Some are following their dreams of a simpler lifestyle.

programme.title: Lotovõitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.sub-title: A New Culture In Puerto Morelos
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Rannamajade otsinguil
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Kinnisvaratehingud
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Kõik suuremad tsivilisatsioonid uskusid needustesse ja nende võimesse tekitada pahaaimamatutele kahju. Inimesed kardavad ikka veel minna neetud kohta või puudutada vaidetavalt neetud eset. Kui needused on reaalsed, siis mis neid esile kutsub?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Auhinnatud ajakirjanik Linda Moulton Howe on ule nelja aastakumne kajastanud kõige salaparasemaid nahtusi Maal. Kas ta uurimused veidratest loomasurmadest kujutisteni viljapõldudel ja tulnukate roovimisteni võivad viia meid uue, sugava reaalsuseni?

programme.title: Tulnukate rantšo
programme.desc: Kui enamik inimesi otsib maavalist elu taevast, siis uks grupp uurijaid kaitub vastupidiselt - nad otsivad seda maa alt. Skinwalkeri rantšo Utah osariigis on kuulus paigana, kus on taheldatud sadu paranormaalseid ja UFO-dega seotud nahtusi.

programme.title: Muistsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Giorgio Tsoukalos uurib Peruu kõrbes olevate Nazca joonte mõistatust. Sajad hiiglaslikud jooned - loomade, geomeetriliste kujundite ja isegi tulnukalaadsete olendite kujulised - laiuvad miilide ulatuses ule kuiva tasandiku.

programme.title: Peale Skinwalkeri rantšo
programme.desc: Andy ja Paul naasevad Colorado karjarantšosse, kus on viimase 25 a jooksul toimunud 16 loomade vigastamist ja kus asub sild, mis võib sisaldada dimensiooniportaali, ning avastavad šokeerivaid tõendeid, mis on otseselt seotud Skinwalkeri rantšoga.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Ton ja Allen suunduvad Hollywoodi oksjonile ja kohtuvad uue konkurendiga, kellel on nailiselt lõputu rahavoog. Parast seda, kui nad avastavad kolme toruga pussi ja antiikse kaamelisadula, seisab Allen silmitsi vana lapsepõlvehirmuga.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: New Orleansi reisil puuavad Ton ja Allen segada ari ja lõbu. Nad sõdivad kohalike elanikega karmil oksjonil, võidavad Mardi Gras konteineri, mis sisaldab konfetipuhurit ja moodsat kallioopet, ning lahevad siis linna peale.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Suur uleujutus. Egiptuse katkud. Soodoma ja Gomorra. Punase mere poolitamine Moosese poolt. Kas need on pelgalt muinasjutud või võivad need olla ajalooliselt tapsed? Kui jah, siis kas need olid kummalised sundmused või Jumala teod?

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Samal ajal, kui meeskond jatkab legendaarse Chappelli varakambri otsimist Money Pitist, avastatakse salaparasest soost uusi ehitisi, mis toetavad arenevat teooriat.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick puuab 28 Heisman Trophy võitjate poolt signeeritud jalgpallikiivrit - kuid kas tal õnnestub muuja hinda pisut alla saada? Seejarel asub Corey ostma poe jaoks havitavalt lahedat "Transformersi" manguasja. Kas ta suudab teha hea tehingu?

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Ton ja Allen ostavad elektriauto, kuid kuna akud puuduvad, on kallis remont nende ainus võimalus kasu teenida. Kas kodune pruulimissusteem ja tipptasemel õhupussid aitavad looki pehmendada või toovad need hoopis palju kahjumit?

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Poisid saavad saagiks kohandatud driftiauto ja luksuslike antiikesemetega uksuse, kus võib olla ainulaadne I maailmasõja piloodipustol. Puudes relva paritolu jalile saada, jatab Toni juhtjalg nad automuugiga hatta.

programme.title: Tules karastunud
programme.desc: New Agrariani koolis Bigforkis, Montanas, pannakse kolm tippseppa proovile nagu ei kunagi varem. Parast kahte rasket katsumust paaseb finaali vaid uks neist.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Kui muuja tuleb Henri de Toulouse-Lautreci plakatiga, kas see avaldab Rickile muljet või utleb ta nagemist? Vahepeal võtab Chum valja mõned 1912. aasta Yalei pesapallivormid. Kas see on kodujooks või valjalook?

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Allen lohistab naljase Toni nadalavahetuse oksjonile ja mõned algajad ostjad uritavad kogu kasumit ara suua. Kas rikša, lammutuspall ja detonaatorid on piisavad, et rahuldada Toni isu, või lahevad poisid naljasena koju?

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Karmid pakkujad liituvad, et Ton ja Allen oksjonil maha võtta. Parast paari võitu uritavad poisid muua indiaanlaste poolt kasutatud arsenali ja vana karnevalivarustust. Kuid kas nad saavad tunga?

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Ainulaadsed leiud viivad poisid mõne hea muugini. Nad puuavad tõendada Titanicu filmi rekvisiite, Ton seisab maohammustuskomplekti muugi ajal vastamisi lõgismaoga ja Allen asub mootorsaagide mahalaadimise ajal jaaskulptuure tegema.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: 21. sajandil on UFOd muutunud friikide teadusest peavoolu kinnisideeks. UFO-jahtijad kasutavad uskumatut tehnoloogiat ja UFOsid uuritakse avalikult. Kas me oleme lahemal kui eales varem, et mõista meie taevas toimuvaid kummalisi sundmusi?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ivy veab Isaiah Victorvillei karistuseks, et ta on saanud hindeks kolmesid. Kenny tahab sisustada oma uut maja, kuid tema teel on kaheksa põhjust. Ja me ei taha kõlada imalalt, aga Lisa õpib palju.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Brandi on vaga huvitatud oma brandi laiendamisest San Bernardinos. Rene on kindel, et kõik tahavad teda katte saada. Dusty jahib laoboksi, mis on tolmusem kui ta ise. Kenny aga on omadega rabas.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Lisa naaseb Moreno Valleysse, kus kõik algas, ja nostalgitseb oma laoboksi juures. Kenny tervitab klanni uut lapselast ja tahaks leida sobiva laoboksi. Dusty ja Lupe lisavad oma ostule pisut higi ja vaeva.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Juba sadu aastaid on liikunud legendid, et kõikjal Ameerika Ühendriikides on peidetud tohutuid aarded. Kuid kas need legendid kadunud aaretest on pelgalt jutud? Või on võimalik, et uskumatud aarded ootavad tõesti avastamist?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick ja Chum saavad usna geniaalse paki, mis sisaldab Albert Einsteini allkirjastatud kirju. Kas nad suudavad valja arvutada võrrandi, et sõlmida tehingut? Chum ja Corey imetlevad Thori kiivri ja haamri replikaid. Kas neid peetakse vaartusetuks?

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Edasise uurimise kaigus kahtlustab seltskond, et 5. platsil toimusid mitmed salajased operatsioonid, mis võivad olla seotud aiašahtiga.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: 21. sajandil on UFOd muutunud friikide teadusest peavoolu kinnisideeks. UFO-jahtijad kasutavad uskumatut tehnoloogiat ja UFOsid uuritakse avalikult. Kas me oleme lahemal kui eales varem, et mõista meie taevas toimuvaid kummalisi sundmusi?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Vana testamendi kohaselt andis jumal Moosesele korralduse ehitada seaduselaeka. Kuid kuidas sai selline hinnatud religioosne ese lihtsalt kaduda? Ja kas on võimalik, et laegas on tegelikult juba leitud?

programme.title: Ajaloo suurimad saladused
programme.desc: Salaparane kividest moodustis on Inglismaa maastikku kaunistanud juba mitutuhat aastat. Kuid tanaseni ei tea keegi, kuidas ja miks see rajati. Kas tanapaeva tehnoloogia suudab lõpuks selle saladused avada? Mis on Stonehengei tõeline eesmark?

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Poisid jaavad kinni laoboksi juurde, mida nad ei tahtnud, ja peavad sorteerima prugi, et jõuda oma lõpptulemuseni. Nad avastavad klaasipuhumisvahendid, autogrammidega pesapallid ja hokilitri heitja, mis paneb Toni tulejoonele.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Oksjon Alleni vanal jahialal kaivitab malestused "uksiku hundina" luusimisest. Poisid leiavad komplekti RC võidusõidupaate ja kui nad ostavad meheliku laouksuse, mis on tais vana viskit, viib oine pidutsemine keerulise muugini.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Allen ei ole hommikukohvita vormis, kuid mõned lõbusad esemed aitavad tal energiat taastada. Poisid leiavad maadlusringi ja kui Allen avastab vanaaegsed mehaanilised kujud, tuletavad need talle meelde tema paevi lõbustuspargi paadikaptenina.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick rokib, kui uks muuja toob kohale spordijaki, mida kandis Rolling Stonesi Keith Richards. Kas ta saab rahulolu või pagendab ta jaki? Siis jõuab letile Jaapani samuraimask. Kas Chum suudab hea hinna valja hirmutada?

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Parast kaks aastat kestnud ootamist saab meeskond Muoni topograafia andmed ja saab teada, et Aladdini koopana tuntud õõnsusel võib olla rohkem saladusi.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Kõik suuremad tsivilisatsioonid uskusid needustesse ja nende võimesse tekitada pahaaimamatutele kahju. Inimesed kardavad ikka veel minna neetud kohta või puudutada vaidetavalt neetud eset. Kui needused on reaalsed, siis mis neid esile kutsub?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Inimkonda on paelunud mõte, et inimene reisib uhel paeval labi aja. Aga mis siis, kui ajas reisimine on juba toimunud? Inimestel on ehk õnnestunud reisida labi ajakanga, kas meelega... või hoopis juhuslikult?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Brandi on otsustanud Santa Anas lõpuks tõepoolest kapi võita ja peab selleks ennast vaos hoidma. Rene markab laoboksis asjade virna, mis teda kõnetab. Kenny edastab oma vajadused universumile, samal ajal kui Barry puuab mangus pusida.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ivy veab Isaiah Victorvillei karistuseks, et ta on saanud hindeks kolmesid. Kenny tahab sisustada oma uut maja, kuid tema teel on kaheksa põhjust. Ja me ei taha kõlada imalalt, aga Lisa õpib palju.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Kui uks sõber astub Ricki ja Chumi juurest labi, et naidata neile fotokollektsiooni staaridest, siis kas duo paljastab õige hinna või saab noorida? Pandimajja jõuab retro-LP singliga "We Are the World". Kas see tehing muudab Corey paeva helgemaks?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Esineb intrigeerivaid tõendeid, mis viitavad intelligentsete kaitsesusteemide olemasolule, mis naivad Maad kaitsvat. Kas kõik need relvad võisid parineda... tulnukate arsenalist?

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Ton ja Allen ostavad elektriauto, kuid kuna akud puuduvad, on kallis remont nende ainus võimalus kasu teenida. Kas kodune pruulimissusteem ja tipptasemel õhupussid aitavad looki pehmendada või toovad need hoopis palju kahjumit?

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Poisid saavad saagiks kohandatud driftiauto ja luksuslike antiikesemetega uksuse, kus võib olla ainulaadne I maailmasõja piloodipustol. Puudes relva paritolu jalile saada, jatab Toni juhtjalg nad automuugiga hatta.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Brandi krahmab West Covinas endale korraliku maatuki ja see tasub end kenasti ara. Rene ei suuda vastu panna hea seifi saladusele. Kenny ei suuda oma nalga rahuldada, samal ajal kui Barry kasutab võimalust, et konkurentide tagant napata.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Arst on... Riversideis. Rene võtab suurelt ette. Ivy leiab asjadest pungil laoboksi ja komistab ebatavalise paritoluga antiikesemete peale. Darrell haarab vaiksema boksi, kuid avastab, et head asjad on mõnikord tõepoolest vaikestes pakendites.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Juba sadu aastaid on liikunud legendid, et kõikjal Ameerika Ühendriikides on peidetud tohutuid aarded. Kuid kas need legendid kadunud aaretest on pelgalt jutud? Või on võimalik, et uskumatud aarded ootavad tõesti avastamist?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Inimkonda on paelunud mõte, et inimene reisib uhel paeval labi aja. Aga mis siis, kui ajas reisimine on juba toimunud? Inimestel on ehk õnnestunud reisida labi ajakanga, kas meelega... või hoopis juhuslikult?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ivy võtab Stantonis endale jarelevalverolli ja see juhib ta vaiksele slaavi edule. Brandi uritab aidata Danielleil oma uut korterit sisustada. Lisa panustab maalile.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Dusty ja Lupe sõidavad Fullertonis toimuvale oksjonile, kuid vajavad lõpuks veoautot. Darrell paneb oma lootused vaikesele laoboksile, mille eest ta ule maksis. Rene võtab maksimumi "mesinadalate laoboksist" ja asjad lahevad veidi tormakaks.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Taas Montebellos, tuleb Gunter "appi" Renele, kes ei anna talle selleks aega. Darrell uritab Kimberit oma kuningannaks teha, samal ajal kui Ivy ja ta poisid teevad Rochambeau moel teed uhke pakkumiseni.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Üle kogu maailma on keelatud "kolmnurgad" - salaparased piirkonnad, kuhu sisenevad laevad, lennukid ja inimesed, mis seejarel lihtsalt kaovad. Kas need kohad trotsivad fuusikaseadusi? Või on Maal tõesti mõned kohad, kuhu me lihtsalt ei tohi minna?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Chum satub Teen Spiriti meeleollu, kui poodi jõuab ainulaadne Kurt Cobainiga seotud ese. Klient tuleb sisse Jurassic Parki mangumarkide kollektsiooniga ja Chumile esitatakse kopsakas hind 775 000 dollarit.

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Parast kaks aastat kestnud ootamist saab meeskond Muoni topograafia andmed ja saab teada, et Aladdini koopana tuntud õõnsusel võib olla rohkem saladusi.

programme.title: Muistsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Iidsete astronautide teooria usku Giorgio Tsoukalos jagab mõtteid hiiglaslike kivimoodustiste ja kummaliste hiidkujude kohta, mida tuntakse monoliitidena. Mis sundis iidseid inimesi ule maailma hiiglaslikke kive liigutama ja kivimonumente ehitama?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Esineb intrigeerivaid tõendeid, mis viitavad intelligentsete kaitsesusteemide olemasolule, mis naivad Maad kaitsvat. Kas kõik need relvad võisid parineda... tulnukate arsenalist?

programme.title: Oksjonikutid

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Natasha riskib kasumi ja ajaga, kui signaalid ristuvad massiivse raadiotorni mõõtmetega, samal ajal kui Dwight ja Tyesha kardavad tagajargi parast seda, kui superkangelaste kujud nende valve all ruustatakse.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick ja Corey tõttavad uurima 1968. aasta kabrioletti. Kas labiraakimised kulgevad kahku või põiklevad nad halva tehingu eest kõrvale? Siis tulevad mangu kondid, kui Chum jahib tukikest oreodonti fossiili. Aga kas ta saab dinosaurusliku hinna?

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Parast seda, kui Muoni andmed teatasid põnevast sihtmargist Aladdini koopana tuntud õõnsuses, kus on leitud suuri kulla ja hõbeda jalgi, avastab meeskond nailiselt inimese loodud sisse- ja valjapaasud sellesse kummalisse koopasse.

programme.title: Ajaloo suurimad saladused
programme.desc: Salaparane kividest moodustis on Inglismaa maastikku kaunistanud juba mitutuhat aastat. Kuid tanaseni ei tea keegi, kuidas ja miks see rajati. Kas tanapaeva tehnoloogia suudab lõpuks selle saladused avada? Mis on Stonehengei tõeline eesmark?

programme.title: Tules karastunud
programme.desc: Clay Spenceri sepikojas pannakse kolm parimat seppa proovile. Parast kahte kurnavat võistlusvooru saab võitja võimaluse võistelda teiste seppade vastu kogu Ameerikast peaauhinna nimel.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Brandi on vaga huvitatud oma brandi laiendamisest San Bernardinos. Rene on kindel, et kõik tahavad teda katte saada. Dusty jahib laoboksi, mis on tolmusem kui ta ise. Kenny aga on omadega rabas.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Lisa naaseb Moreno Valleysse, kus kõik algas, ja nostalgitseb oma laoboksi juures. Kenny tervitab klanni uut lapselast ja tahaks leida sobiva laoboksi. Dusty ja Lupe lisavad oma ostule pisut higi ja vaeva.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Paljude arvates on maiad Ameerika ajaloo vagevaim tsivilisatsioon, mis õitses enam kui 2000 aastat. Nuud on avastatud uusi tõendeid, mis muudavad taielikult meie arusaama sellest iidsest kultuurist.

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Meeskond avastab soos seni tundmatu konstruktsiooni, mis meenutab markimisvaarselt konteinerit. Ja parast nadalatepikkust Chappelli varakambri jahtimist avastab seltskond sugavalt Money Pitist tuhimiku.

programme.title: Muistsete tulnukate eriesitlus
programme.desc: Iidsete astronautide teoreetikud on juba ammu vaitnud, et Maa on maavaline laboratoorium. Kas see hõlmab sel juhul lisaks inimestele ka loomi? Üle maailma võib leida teateid loom-jumalate kohta, mis kummalisel moel peegeldavad kohtumisi tulnukatega.

programme.desc: Brandi krahmab West Covinas endale korraliku maatuki ja see tasub end kenasti ara. Rene ei suuda vastu panna hea seifi saladusele. Kenny ei suuda oma nalga rahuldada, samal ajal kui Barry kasutab võimalust, et konkurentide tagant napata.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Arst on... Riversideis. Rene võtab suurelt ette. Ivy leiab asjadest pungil laoboksi ja komistab ebatavalise paritoluga antiikesemete peale. Darrell haarab vaiksema boksi, kuid avastab, et head asjad on mõnikord tõepoolest vaikestes pakendites.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Paljude arvates on maiad Ameerika ajaloo vagevaim tsivilisatsioon, mis õitses enam kui 2000 aastat. Nuud on avastatud uusi tõendeid, mis muudavad taielikult meie arusaama sellest iidsest kultuurist.

programme.title: Food Tech
programme.desc: If you have ever wondered how egg rolls are mass produced or what is inside a hamburger, have a look at the Food Tech hosted by Bobby Bognar. Bobby have worked in the food industry and restaurants most of his life, and is in love with food. In every episode he makes a preparation of a well-known American meal and tracks the ingredients from the field or factory to your plate, presenting fantastic stories hiding behind your favourite food.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: Reality series following the adventures of Egyptologist Dr Zahi Hawass and his team as they search for the secrets of ancient Egypt. Travelling across this fascinating country, Dr Zahi Hawass and his crew embark on a historical and archaeological expedition – and try to preserve important artefacts.

programme.title: Jumalate kokkupõrge
programme.desc: Kui olumpialased mutoloogia vagevaimas mõõduvõtus titaanidele valjakutse esitasid, laks lahti ulim jumalate kokkupõrge. See oluline lahing võis ekspertide arvates olla iidne kood tõesti aset leidnud sundmusele.

programme.title: Search for the Lost Giants
programme.desc: Search for the Lost Giants follows two brothers on their quest to find lost giants. According to the Bible there were ancient giants wandering along the Earth. A few years ago some Freemasons found stone structures and corridors underground that indicated a lost civilization. The brothers Bill and Jim Viera are looking for evidence of missing bones from ancient skeletons that are suspected to have clocked in at over seven feet tall.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: A television documentary series which tells the full story of the origins, development and downfall of the famous Roman Empire between the 2nd century BC to the era of the last Western Roman emperor in the 5th century AD. The Romans are regarded as one of the most revolutionary Empires in the entire course of history and a substantial amount of theories, principles and engineering techniques they experimented with are still applied to this day. This thirteen-part series explores the Germanic, Britannic and other barbarian tribal wars which ultimately led to the fall of the Roman Empire.

programme.title: Tundmatu
programme.desc: Rokitaht Tom DeLongei poolt kokku kutsutud endised USA valitsusametnikud uritavad koos valja selgitada, mida valitsus UFO-de kohta teab.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: Life After People

programme.title: How the Earth was made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: A television documentary series which tells the full story of the origins, development and downfall of the famous Roman Empire between the 2nd century BC to the era of the last Western Roman emperor in the 5th century AD. The Romans are regarded as one of the most revolutionary Empires in the entire course of history and a substantial amount of theories, principles and engineering techniques they experimented with are still applied to this day. This thirteen-part series explores the Germanic, Britannic and other barbarian tribal wars which ultimately led to the fall of the Roman Empire.

programme.title: Allilma linnad
programme.desc: In major cities around the world today, skyscrapers loom overhead, taxis honk their horns and street vendors peddle their wares. But below lies city upon city - each with its fascinating and unknown history. This series will explore these layers, which are often hundreds of feet deep, and examine a citys ancient cisterns, dank dungeons, eerie tombs, clandestine hideouts, and even underground shipwrecks that have been lost for hundreds and hundreds of years. What are the underground layers of the most populated cities on earth? And how did (and do) engineers build layer upon layer up to todays city streets? This series will reveal the technological marvels that allowed the construction of one city upon another - literally.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Ajaloo ruustamine
programme.desc: Kui Douglas Latchfordi suudistatakse Kambodža tapavaljadelt varastatud mitmemiljonilise roovsaagi omastamises, seisavad muuseumid ja kollektsionaarid silmitsi karmi tõsiasjaga, et nende valduses on varastatud vara.

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: Mis siis saab, kui Neptuuni-suurune rõngastega planeet võtab suuna Maa poole? See lõpeb nelja tunni jooksul taieliku havinguga.

programme.title: Battles BC
programme.desc: Step back in time and revisit some of the most brutal battles that took place before Christ. Recreated with stunning technology, we reveal these violent conflicts like never before, examining the soldiers, strategies and weapons deployed by the powerful legions. From Hannibals clashes with Rome to Alexander the Greats pursuits throughout India, these conflicts have had a resounding impact on our history and with these reconstructions you will see the ferocious aspects of war in antiquity.

programme.title: How the Earth was made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: A television documentary series which tells the full story of the origins, development and downfall of the famous Roman Empire between the 2nd century BC to the era of the last Western Roman emperor in the 5th century AD. The Romans are regarded as one of the most revolutionary Empires in the entire course of history and a substantial amount of theories, principles and engineering techniques they experimented with are still applied to this day. This thirteen-part series explores the Germanic, Britannic and other barbarian tribal wars which ultimately led to the fall of the Roman Empire.

programme.title: Allilma linnad
programme.desc: In major cities around the world today, skyscrapers loom overhead, taxis honk their horns and street vendors peddle their wares. But below lies city upon city - each with its fascinating and unknown history. This series will explore these layers, which are often hundreds of feet deep, and examine a citys ancient cisterns, dank dungeons, eerie tombs, clandestine hideouts, and even underground shipwrecks that have been lost for hundreds and hundreds of years. What are the underground layers of the most populated cities on earth? And how did (and do) engineers build layer upon layer up to todays city streets? This series will reveal the technological marvels that allowed the construction of one city upon another - literally.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.desc: Kui Douglas Latchfordi suudistatakse Kambodža tapavaljadelt varastatud mitmemiljonilise roovsaagi omastamises, seisavad muuseumid ja kollektsionaarid silmitsi karmi tõsiasjaga, et nende valduses on varastatud vara.

programme.title: Kasabian - Live at iTunes Festival
programme.desc: ITunes Festival, is an annual music festival that takes place over a month in London. Sponsored by Apple Inc., it had its first edition in 2007

programme.title: Music Icons
programme.desc: Pulp came together as a band in 1980 Sheffield. Early rehearsals took place in singer Jarvis Cockers sitting room. Pulp didnt really hit public consciousness for a long, long time. The first three albums, It, Freaks and Separations and the single My Legendary Girlfriend was a bit of a music press fave. A lot of people raving about that in the NME. After being frustrated at the distribution and reception of their first three albums, Pulp signed to the independent label, Gift. But they were soon taken on by island Records. The interest from the labels came from the new songs they were performing live, notably one which would become their breakthrough track, Babies. The single, Do You Remember The First Time, funnily enough became their first top 40 hit. Building on its success, the band released the album His n Hers which entered the UK top 10. Following on from the critical success of His n Hers… Pulp would finally explode on to the mainstream with their huge success of their 1995 single, Common People. The song was the lead single from the album Different Class which topped the UK charts and this time would win Pulp the Mercury Music Prize.

programme.title: Peter Gabriel - Peter Gabriel
programme.sub-title: Peter Gabriel _ Growing Up Live In Italy
programme.desc: This concert film documents Peter Gabriels "Growing Up" tour stop at Milans FilaForum in May 2003.

programme.title: Grace Mitchell - Apple Music Festival
programme.desc: The Apple Music Festival (formerly known as the iTunes Festival) was a music concert series held by Apple, Inc. inaugurated in 2007.

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Def Leppard _ And There Will Be a Next Time
programme.desc: As the sun began to set over a frenzied Detroit crowd, Def Leppard hits the stage in this mind-blowing audio and visual extravaganza that will change your concept of what a rock concert should be! Featuring their biggest hits, this 88 minute, 17 song concert features stunning performances of Pour Some Sugar On Me, Hysteria, Rocket, Photograph, Lets Get Rocked, Rock of Ages, Animal, Foolin, Lets Go, and many more! With stunning video walls, great musicianship, and their greatest hits make for an unforgettable concert experience!

programme.title: BLACKPINK - The Show
programme.desc: The Show opened with "Kill This Love", following a video featuring sights of dark and empty cities around the world.[9] Apart from live performances it also included several pre-recorded tracks.[10] Each member performed their own solo stage; Jennie performed her song "Solo" with new rap lyrics written by her, and Rose shared a preview of her solo debut "Gone", while Jisoo and Lisa performed covers of Tove Los "Habits (Stay High)" and Doja Cats "Say So " respectively, both adding new self-written lyrics .

programme.title: Iggy Pop - Austin City Limits
programme.desc: The Austin City Limits Music Festival is an annual music festival that takes place at Zilker Park in Austin, Texas. The festival features more than 130 bands on eight stages for three days.

programme.title: Scorpions - Moment of Glory
programme.desc: This concert from the Scorpions home city of Hanover was the climax of EXPO2000. The legendary German rock band, with worldwide album sales in excess of 75 million, perform live on stage with the perhaps even more legendary Berlin Philharmonic Orchestra conducted by Christian Kolonovits. The concert was a recreation of their ""Moment Of Glory"" album, also recorded with the BPO, which took their classic tracks and gave them a full orchestral backing.

programme.title: Prince - The Unauthorized Biography
programme.desc: Documentary focusing on the legendary musicians life and work, from his troubled childhood in Minneapolis to becoming one of the most popular and innovative artists in contemporary music.

programme.title: Music Icons
programme.desc: Neil Tennant and Chris Lowe met in a record store in West London. Although they came from different backgrounds they bonded over a love of electronic music. "Hague" their debut album "Please" was released in 1986, it entered the top 10 around the world. In 2013 the band released "Electric", which after the mellow Elysium saw them return to their dance roots, 30 years into their career the Pet Shop Boys remain top of the charts. Featuring archive material, music videos "Vocal", "Love etc".and, exclusive insights from music critics and journalists Michael Bonner (Uncut Magazine), Hamish MacBain (Shortlist), John Aizlewood (Evening Standard)

programme.title: Shakira - Oral Fixation Tour
programme.desc: Oral Fixation Tour was the fourth concert tour by Colombian singer and songwriter, Shakira. It was launched in support of her sixth and seventh studio albums Fijacion Oral, Vol. 1 (2005). and Oral Fixation, Vol. 2 (2005).

programme.title: WALK the MOON - Live in London
programme.desc: Filmed at Roundhouse, London, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Walk the Moon performs their hits including "Shiver Shiver", "Next in Line", "Anna Sun" and many more.

programme.title: Foo Fighters _ Austin City Limits
programme.desc: The Austin City Limits Music Festival is an annual music festival that takes place at Zilker Park in Austin, Texas. The festival features more than 130 bands on eight stages for three days.

programme.title: 30 Seconds To Mars _ Live in London
programme.desc: Filmed at Roundhouse, London, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic 30 Seconds to Mars featuring unforgettable version of their hits: This Is War, Up In The Air, "Hurricane" and many more…

programme.title: The Grateful Dead - Classic Albums
programme.sub-title: The Grateful Dead - Classic Albums: Anthem To Beauty
programme.desc: This installment of the Classic Albums series follows the making of two Grateful Dead albums, the fiercely experimental Anthem of the Sun and the understated masterwork American Beauty, which spawned melodic gems like "Sugar Magnolia" and "Ripple." Between the archival scenes and contemporary interviews with band members, the program shows a band making seismic in roads in pop music and five young guys coming to terms with artistry, mortality, and, yes, the pursuit of happiness. There is priceless footage of Neal Cassady driving Ken Keseys bus and of the Dead, surrounded by martini sipping hipsters, on Playboy After Dark. The best scenes involve band members talking about specific songs (you will never hear Phil Leshs "Box of Rain" again without thinking of it as a gift to his dying father) or deconstructing a tune by playing each track separately. Intimate and surprisingly cohesive, Anthem to Beauty is a rare glimpse into how the Deads magic was made.

programme.title: Shakira - Oral Fixation Tour

programme.title: Evanescence - Synthesis Live
programme.desc: In 2003, Evanescence released Fallen, one of the most decade-defining albums (and one of the most successful debut albums of all time) and have gone on to became one of the most well-loved and respected bands of their generation. In the 15 years since their debut, Evanescence founder and lead-singer, Amy Lee, toured the world, has scored motion picture films and even took a 3 year break to start a family. In late 2017, Evanescence re-emerged from their hiatus with Synthesis—a reimagining of their best-known songs with orchestra and electronics and an accompanying sold-out and highly-acclaimed world tour. On November 3, 2017 Evanescence performed "Synthesis Live" in front of a sold out crowd at the Grand Theater at Foxwoods Casino in CT.

programme.title: Florence + the Machine _ Live at Apple Music Festival
programme.desc: The Apple Music Festival (formerly known as the iTunes Festival) was a music concert series held by Apple, Inc. inaugurated in 2007.

programme.title: Bring Me the Horizon - Reading and Leeds Festival
programme.desc: The Reading and Leeds Festivals are a pair of music festivals that take place annually in the cities of Reading and Leeds in England. Featuring Bring Me The Horizon.

programme.title: The Moody Blues - Days of Future Passed Live
programme.desc: Celebrating the 50th anniversary of their landmark album, Days of Future Passed, The Moody Blues took to the road to perform the entire LP live. This film, capturing an electric evening at The Sony Centre, Toronto, where the band was joined on stage by a full orchestra for the first time ever, is the definitive performance of this seminal album. This spectacle of a show features stunning visuals and a unique narration performed by Jeremy Irons, transporting the audience and viewer to the psychedelic dream world of their classic record. Including the iconic hits Nights In White Satin and Tuesday Afternoon, this film truly pays homage to five decades of musical mastery. In this impressive yet intimate auditorium, The Moody Blues have never sounded better.

programme.title: Motorhead - Rock Im Park
programme.desc: Rock im Park is a music festival that takes place in Nuremberg, Germany, lasting three days. Featuring : Motorhead

programme.title: Slash and Myles Kennedy and The Conspirators - Live At the Roxy
programme.desc: On September 25th 2014, shortly after the release of their "World On Fire" album, Slash with Myles Kennedy and The Conspirators took the stage at the legendary Roxy Theatre on Sunset Strip in West Hollywood. The atmospheric venue, steeped in rock history, gave fans a brilliant opportunity to experience the band up close as they delivered a set packed with more recent solo tracks, including several from the new album, and classics from Slashs earlier career with Guns n Roses and Velvet Revolver. The intimate setting inspired the band to deliver a scintillating, dynamic performance that is brilliantly captured on this digital release.

programme.title: Rod Stewart _ Live at Hyde Park
programme.desc: On a sunny day in September 2015, Rod Stewart took to the stage in Londons Hyde Park to bring to a close BBC Radio 2s annual Festival in a Day. In front of 50,000 people, Rod delivered not his usual stadium set but a bespoke selection of hits from his back catalogue spanning his career, including Gasoline Alley, Angel, In a Broken Dream and The Killing of Georgie (Part 1 and 2), plus Faces classics such as Ooh La La and the blues standard Rollin and Tumblin, a number that Rod used to perform with Long John Baldry back in the day. To close the set, Rod brought on his old pal guitarist Jim Cregan to help him perform his 1978 hit I Was Only Joking. All in all, a memorable and unique concert that is unlikely to be repeated anytime soon.

programme.title: Music Icons
programme.desc: In the 1980s, The Smiths shattered the musical landscape with a startling sound unlike any other at the time. With the four albums they released, they inspired a whole new generation of musicians. formed The Smiths. A name specifically chosen for being ordinary. Signing to indie label, Rough Trade, the new group released their first single, "Hand in Glove" in May 1983. The Smiths disbanded upon the release of their final album, Strangeways, Here We Come. Featuring archive material, music videos - "HAND IN GLOVE" "THIS CHARMING MAN" and, exclusive insights from music critics and journalists JOHN AIZLEWOOD (Evening Standard), DANIELLE PERRY (XFM), WILL HODGKINSON (The Times) and CAMILLA PIA (BBC Radio 6).

programme.title: Shakira - Oral Fixation Tour
programme.desc: Oral Fixation Tour was the fourth concert tour by Colombian singer and songwriter, Shakira. It was launched in support of her sixth and seventh studio albums Fijacion Oral, Vol. 1 (2005). and Oral Fixation, Vol. 2 (2005).

programme.title: Evanescence - Synthesis Live
programme.desc: In 2003, Evanescence released Fallen, one of the most decade-defining albums (and one of the most successful debut albums of all time) and have gone on to became one of the most well-loved and respected bands of their generation. In the 15 years since their debut, Evanescence founder and lead-singer, Amy Lee, toured the world, has scored motion picture films and even took a 3 year break to start a family. programme.title: Robbie Williams - Live at the Apple Music Festival
programme.desc: A brand new show that brings a veteran artist at his best! The talented artist, who became famous in the group ""Take That"", lacks presentations, but he himself begins his show by saying: ""Let me resubmit ..."". Robbie Williams has the ability to reinvent himself, exhibiting so much energy that he seems to be a rookie artist. Already in the 40s band of pop music, Robbie is more than an artist consecrated worldwide, is a reference with hits present in the best lists of consecrated DJs. This show at the Roundhouse coincided with the announcement of their 11th solo album, Heavy Entertainment Show, just released. The new albums title reflects Williams performance as energy-dense as his 11-member big band, including his hits partner Guy Chambers on the piano. A formidable 90 minute pop odyssey. Mixing tracks from his Take That era, old or new, his songs allow him to reclaim his throne from an artist who dominates the stage - in fact, there is no one in pop music who combines his monumental energy with music Touching. A magical moment can be perceived in ""A Better Man"", only with the guitar on stage; Proof that he is an artist that goes beyond the scenery. This Blu-Ray shows the trajectory of an artist who knows how to renew himself every lap; An example for the new generations of music that are lost in appearance, forgetting the essential aspect that Robbie Williams is revealing more and more.

programme.title: Haim - Live at Main Square Festival 2013
programme.desc: Watch the performance of Haim live at the Main Square Festival on July 5th, 2013.

programme.title: James Morrison - T In the Park
programme.desc: T in the Park festival is a major Scottish music festival that has been held almost annually since 1994 (the event did not take place in 2017). It is named after its main sponsor, the brewing company Tennents.

programme.title: Metallica - Master of Puppets
programme.desc: Master of Puppets is the third studio album released by American thrash metal / heavy metal band Metallica, released March 3, 1986

programme.title: Lady Gaga _ Live in London
programme.desc: Lady Gagas performance at the iTunes Festival in London on September 1, 2013 marks the superstars first full concert since the The Born This Way Ball. It is an eight song set containing the world premiere of seven tracks from her fourth album, ARTPOP: "Aura"; "MANiCURE"; "Artpop"; "Jewels N Drugs" ft. T.I., Too $hort and Twista; "Sexxx Dreams", "Swine"; and "I Wanna Be With You", a song that transformed into "Dope" for ARTPOP. During the concert, captured stunningly in HD, Gaga says that shes "a bit like Dorothy right now." The stage is her Kansas, the crowd is her family, and their reunion is pure magic. Lady Gaga, her dancers, and her band traverse through visual and musical themes of love, sex, violence, beauty, danger, empowerment, hustle, lust, and above all ART. Throughout, Gaga lays her heart bare for the audience and the cameras with every note sung and every word spoken.

programme.title: Deep Purple - Rock Review
programme.desc: This is the independent review of the music that changed the face of rock music forever. Featuring new in-depth interviews with original founder member Nicky Simper and Purple Mark III stalwart Glenn Hughes the film draws on rare footage of Purple in concert, in the studio and on the road. Also featured is behind the scenes footage of the band on tour in 1974, the first television appearances by the Mark II line up and a rare glimpse of the original Mark I line up in performance. We also hear the views of Jon Lord, Ritchie Blackmore, Iain Paice, Ian Gillan and David Coverdale.

programme.title: Eric Clapton and Steve Winwood - Live from Madison Square Garden
programme.desc: History rocked and rock made history during a sold-out three-gig stand at Madison Square Garden in late February 2008 when icons Eric Clapton and Steve Winwood performed a concert together for the first time since their all-too-brief days in the legendary Blind Faith in 1969. Whether they will ever team again is unknown. But with Eric Clapton and Steve Winwood Live From Madison Square Garden fans everywhere are able to experience the sound and the glory of a performance on that famous stage by two of rocks greatest artists.

programme.title: Ben Howard - Live at the Launch Pad
programme.desc: Ben Howard works through a dramatic set in Austin TX, starting humble and concluding in a cataclysmic storm of drums, snapping guitar strings, and a delirious crowd taking it all in.

programme.title: Fatal Affairs
programme.desc: A married mother takes to Tinder under a pseudonym and embarks on a steamy affair. But when her lies are exposed, the fallout results in bloodshed.

programme.title: Kurjus elab siin
programme.desc: Based on real life events. Evil Lives Here is a true crime story show that speaks to family members of well-known murderers and criminals. It includes re-enactments, police footage, family photographs and videos that gives you the view through the murderers eyes. The programme is also styled to make you imagine it in the eyes of a loved one that you know. It is an in-depth investigation into the criminals life and the life of the family after the crime. It also looks into possible reasons why the criminal committed the crime without placing a viewpoint.

programme.title: The Curious Case of...
programme.desc: Master conman, Nicholas Alahverdian, aka Nicholas Rossi, fakes his own death to evade justice, adopts new identities and leaves a trail of alleged crimes across continents, now resurfaced as Arthur Knight, he spins his most audacious con in court.

programme.title: The Murder Of Gabby Petito
programme.sub-title: The Murder Of Gabby Petito: A Faking It Special
programme.desc: Online dream. Real life nightmare. Experts in body language, linguistics, and psychology study police bodycam, spotting the signs that point to the murder of Gabby Petito.

programme.title: Last Night in...
programme.desc: Explore the dark side of cities before and after the sun goes down, when the onset of darkness transforms the cityscape into a fantasy playground.

programme.title: Deadliest Families
programme.desc: In October 2022, 36-year-old Angie White is found dead at her home in Wales. Alexa recordings from the night of her murder help catch her killer.

programme.title: Deadliest Families
programme.sub-title: A Mother, a Murder and a Manhunt
programme.desc: A bitter custody battle ends in tragedy when a toddler is found dead. A three-year manhunt ensues to track down her killer - her own mother.

programme.title: American Nightmare
programme.desc: Documentary series that uses actual footage of shocking crime scenes and home-videos of victims and their families to document some atrocious incidents of recent years. By seeing real-life images of the people involved in the crime, we are brought up-close and personal with those affected by horrific acts. Interviews with loved ones of the victim and the officers involved in the investigation help us understand the events that followed the crimes.

programme.title: Body Cam
programme.desc: Documentary series following police officers across the USA as they put their lives on the line to enforce the law. Using real footage from the officers body cameras, we show just how deadly routine checks can be, with law enforcement officials having to think on their feet and make split-second decisions to potentially save their, or someone elses, life. From knife-wielding maniacs to brutal shootouts, the series highlights the importance of our police departments. With interviews from the officers involved adding context to the footage, Body Cam Cops gives viewers unprecedented, exclusive access to what life is truly like in the line of duty.

programme.desc: Follow the intimate and shocking stories of people who got deceived by their spouses in a myriad of ways: from lies and cheating to hiding serious crimes like murder. Featuring real footage, offering an insight into the stories.

programme.title: The Lies That Bind
programme.desc: A true-crime series that exposes the sinister secrets and dark betrayals that are often involved in heinous crimes of murder. Sometimes the secret or lie can appear innocent at first but they are soon revealed to have life-altering consequences. Or the indiscretion or flasehood can be deliberately misleading in order to protect the guilty. Investigators have to determine which witness accounts are true and which are false or deceitful. Episodes include stories such as when Louisiana Melton and her boyfriend Phillip Brown are found shot dead and the investigating officer uncovers a huge lie that sheds light on the crime; or when Lisa Moore goes missing shortly after ending her marriage and her family fear the worst; or when a pastors wife is killed when the parsonage is burned down and the fire marshall uncovers a damaging secret.

programme.title: The Lies That Bind

programme.title: Married with Secrets
programme.desc: This drama series takes a look into true crime stories, and investigates incidences of a spouse secretly committing crime under the nose of their other half. This program shows reenactments and dramatised versions of the events that have been unfolded when one partners intentions turnns into a sinister. Men and women in these cases take unexpectedly dark paths with devastating results in return whilst deceiving their devoted partners.

programme.title: Ameerika monstrum
programme.desc: Ohio biker Richard Beasley values family, faith and helping others. When he vanishes, police find an online monster has been luring local men to their deaths.

programme.title: Ameerika monstrum
programme.desc: In Albuquerque, Mike Snyder starts a family with his partner, capturing it on home video. But after being diagnosed with a serious illness, he vanishes. What happened?

programme.title: Kurjus elab siin
programme.desc: Based on real life events. Evil Lives Here is a true crime story show that speaks to family members of well-known murderers and criminals. It includes re-enactments, police footage, family photographs and videos that gives you the view through the murderers eyes. The programme is also styled to make you imagine it in the eyes of a loved one that you know. It is an in-depth investigation into the criminals life and the life of the family after the crime. It also looks into possible reasons why the criminal committed the crime without placing a viewpoint.

programme.title: Feuds Turned Fatal
programme.desc: Two men start an auto body repair business, but a bitter feud erupts, and one man goes missing with indisputable evidence of a brutal murder.

programme.title: Fatal Affairs
programme.desc: A married mother takes to Tinder under a pseudonym and embarks on a steamy affair. But when her lies are exposed, the fallout results in bloodshed.

programme.title: Primal Instinct
programme.desc: In this true-crime documentary series we explore gruesome murders that have transpired after relationships, flings and affairs have turned sour. Using reenactments, each episode graphically details the motives behind the murders, revealing how the relationships spiralled out of control and left someone dead. We follow the story of a different murder in each episode, whether its jealous ex-lovers, paranoid husbands or resentful mistresses. These real life stories show the darker side of love and the deception it can lead to.

programme.title: Love, Honor and Betray
programme.desc: Follow the intimate and shocking stories of people who got deceived by their spouses in a myriad of ways: from lies and cheating to hiding serious crimes like murder. programme.title: True Conviction
programme.desc: True Conviction crime series is based on homicide cases from real life. The series explores how these cases are solved on the street and won in the courtroom. It is hosted by Anna-Sigga Nicolazzi, a decorated Brooklyn prosecutor who has never lost a murder case. She travels across the country to check how the nations top prosecutors handle their toughest cases and meets with other key figures in the cases, including loved ones and investigators.

programme.title: Last Night in...
programme.desc: Explore the dark side of cities before and after the sun goes down, when the onset of darkness transforms the cityscape into a fantasy playground.

programme.title: A Body in the Basement
programme.desc: In 2017, an Ohio couple finds a dismembered body in a basement freezer. It unlocks a harrowing mystery surrounding a missing woman and a tragic love triangle.

programme.title: Dead Reckoning
programme.desc: True crime documentary series examining the troubling task law enforcement officers have, as they scour murder crime scenes for potential clues and evidence that will help them identify the culprit. With dramatic reconstructions that paint a picture of the brutal killing, each episode focusses on a respective case, as detectives scramble to catch the killer. Every potential item of evidence is pieced together, hoping to complete the sinister puzzle and bring justice for the family and friends of the deceased. As they uncover more about the victims, the detectives learn of their dark and mysterious secrets.

programme.title: Dead Reckoning
programme.desc: True crime documentary series examining the troubling task law enforcement officers have, as they scour murder crime scenes for potential clues and evidence that will help them identify the culprit. Every potential item of evidence is pieced together, hoping to complete the sinister puzzle and bring justice for the family and friends of the deceased. As they uncover more about the victims, the detectives learn of their dark and mysterious secrets.

programme.title: Kadunud
programme.desc: Disappeared is an American documentary TV show that contains dramatic re-enactments and interviews with law enforcement officers, investigators, and relatives connected with cases in which individuals have gone missing without a trace. The stories are heartbreaking and unbelievable, the families of people who have gone missing never give up hope. Some cases have tragic endings, some are heartwarming, but most of them are still open which makes the agony of the families go on.

programme.title: The Curious Case of...
programme.desc: Master conman, Nicholas Alahverdian, aka Nicholas Rossi, fakes his own death to evade justice, adopts new identities and leaves a trail of alleged crimes across continents, now resurfaced as Arthur Knight, he spins his most audacious con in court.

programme.title: Kurjuse haal
programme.desc: In 1983, the Secret Service trails a counterfeiter. The audio recordings they find of him torturing women reveal one of history`s most depraved serial killers.

programme.title: The Lake Erie Murders
programme.desc: Coming from the beautiful environs of Lake Erie, straddling the border between the US and Canada, this true life crime show focuses on the more sinister and gruesome tales of some of the regions darkest and deadliest crimes. We explore baffling and mysterious murder cases such as that of the 1989 kidnapping and murder of 10-year-old Amy Mihaljevic which provoked much speculation and intrigue in the area and which is still an open case. Each hourlong episode delves into the case history, analyzes the facts and evidence and carefully examines the detection procedures and how each suspect was cleared of suspicion. Subsequent episodes detail four additional deadly crimes that were solved by local law enforcement.
